title: Hitting level 6 in the forums
body: I can post a discussion but I can't comment? Hopefully this post levels me up somehow. Otherwise I'm sending a support ticket.

replies.body: It looks like this post caused a resync between your Boards profile and your Summoner profile. It shows you as level 30, so you should no longer see issues when trying to comment or post on the boards.
Everything works just fine now, fortunately! :)
